name: Novice Gnome
taunt: Let's see if you even know what 'ls' does!

name: Apprentice Admin
taunt: You’ve mastered the basics… but can you handle users and groups?

name: Daemon Scribe
taunt: Services and mounts are my domain. Tread carefully.

name: Shell Warden
taunt: Your shell skills are weak, mortal!

name: System Guardian
taunt: Let's see how well you know your systemctl magic.

name: Kernel Knight
taunt: Only true warriors understand SELinux and permissions!

name: Network Phantom
taunt: Firewalls, DNS, and IPs — your connectivity ends here.

name: Storage Titan
taunt: LVM, RAID, and mounting madness await you!

name: Virtual Overlord
taunt: Containers, virtualization, and automation — prove your worth!

name: Root Daemon
taunt: You’ve reached the core. Only a true sysadmin can defeat me!
